timeline.bodyText: "ByteBuf.release() was not called before it was garbage collected"
timeline.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText: This is an assertion for a log message emitted by Netty, see https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/44f85bba5f47df885dbbe5243d008220bfbab5ca/common/src/main/java/io/netty/util/ResourceLeakDetector.java#L320
replies.author: romain-grecourt

replies.bodyText: Oh! I see; @danielkec I suppose you should revert the change then.
replies.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText: Need for better commentary empirically verified 😄
replies.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: Added better description, the test is more complicated than I would like it to be, I just didn't found any nicer way to do it without heavy mocking.
replies.author: danielkec

timeline.message:
Second subscribe attempt

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: This one I assume needs to be the same as line 66?
timeline.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText: No its different check and it has its own message, They just happens to have very similar but not exactly same messages. I am tracking both to be extra safe
replies.author: danielkec
